meaning: She is the mechanical force (energy) that exists within every inanimate object.
commentary: Jada is that which lifeless (inanimate energy). Even lifeless object have in them certain energy. Every object in this creation is inherently inanimate. It is Her energy that empowers every object. चिच्छक्तिः (Cicchaktiḥ) (Chaitanya) is the antonym for जडशक्तिः (Jaḍaśaktiḥ) (inanimate energy). Jada also refers to prakriti and maya.
